meanings.definition: Salty or containing a high concentration of salt
meanings.sent1: The briniest soup I ever tasted made me pucker my lips.
meanings.sent2: The ocean water near the shore is usually the briniest.
meanings.sent3: The briniest popcorn I've ever had left me reaching for my drink.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were the briniest, reflecting the depth of her sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The briniest chips in the bag were always the first to disappear at the party.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of salt
meanings.sent1: The briniest air by the sea always invigorates me.
meanings.sent2: The fish had a briniest flavor that reminded me of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: His briniest cologne made him smell like a walking beach.
meanings.sent4: The briniest breeze carried the scent of the nearby waves.
meanings.sent5: The briniest cheese on the platter was a hit among the guests.

meanings.definition: Most salty or containing the highest amount of salt
meanings.sent1: The briniest water in the lake is near the salt mines.
meanings.sent2: The briniest part of the dish was the rim of the glass.
meanings.sent3: She added the briniest seasoning to the dish, making it too salty.
meanings.sent4: The briniest tears streamed down her face as she tasted the soup.
meanings.sent5: The briniest pretzel in the bag was a surprise to my taste buds.
